titles.title: To protect elections for public office by providing financial support and enhanced security for the infrastructure used to carry out such elections, and for other purposes.
Election Security Act of 2019
Election Security Act of 2019
Prevent Election Hacking Act of 2019
Prevent Election Hacking Act of 2019

Election Security Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committees on Homeland Security, Intelligence (Permanent Select), Science, Space, and Technology, Foreign Affairs, and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
